title: dopeyhead.com - A valid use of Comic Sans?
content:
Where better to use Comic Sans than a place called [  
Dopeyhead.com?](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017042552/http:/www.dopeyhead.com/) Can you believe that such a cool domain name was available? I'm not sure what I will do with it, but it will no doubt exceed all expectations.  
; )
author: fontplayer
